author: .vbuterin
content: The Verkle tree EIP has a gas cost scheme that still charges a fixed cost per branch and per chunk, so it doesn't require literal byte by byte awareness

author: .vbuterin
content: But it definitely is much easier to actually implement the scheme

author: .vbuterin
content: The fact that we are going down to a single layer tree really helped a lot in making that simpler

author: .vbuterin
content: The problem with making gas metering more closely based on witness properties today is that there are so many special cases

author: .vbuterin
content: And yes, sibling nodes having variable sizes is definitely one of those special cases
